front.title: The E.164 to Uniform Resource Identifiers (URI) Dynamic Delegation Discovery System (DDDS) Application (ENUM)

abstract.t: This document discusses the use of the Domain Name System (DNS) for storage of E.164 [E164] numbers, and resolving those to URIs that can be used for (for example) call setup. This include how DNS can be used for identifying available services connected to one E.164 number. It obsoletes RFC 3761 [RFC3761]. This version of the document (00) is not more than the start of a discussion for detailed changes.
